description: This file defines a utility object `JoinUtils` with a function to concatenate elements of a custom `LinkedList` into a single string separated by spaces.

classes.name: JoinUtils
classes.description: An internal singleton object providing utility functions for joining elements of a `LinkedList` into a string.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Concatenates all elements of the given `LinkedList` into a single space-separated string.
